title: Blended Learning-Based Competency Enhancement Program for Elementary Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and practical educational field experience
context.additional_context: Application of blended learning to strengthen job relevance for current elementary educators and improve the effectiveness of science education

learning_goals: A science education content development plan can be established by applying blended learning design principles
Three or more integrated offline-online teaching strategies using smartphone-based digital tools can be implemented
A hybrid assessment system for evaluating learning engagement and achievement can be designed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
